data-dictionary.name: adsf
data-dictionary.description: A Short Note On ADS: AD360 is an support administrator tool which helps to manage Active Directory and Exhange by offering the administrators to centrally manage the Security, GPO's, Auditing, Exchange and other objects in the AD through an interactive web console. Other necessary details have been provided along with the tables itself.

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: IS_INTEGRATED
column.description: 0- Details are not Integrated with other products 1- All product knows each other

column.name: INTEGRATED_PRODUCT_NAME
column.description: originating application name from where product is integration

table.name: ADSProductVersions
table.description: Contains the Layout Tab & Product Mapping details

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each integrated product

column.name: MIN_BUILD_NUMBER
column.description: The lowest build that ADS support.

column.name: MAX_BUILD_NUMBER
column.description: The highest build that ADS support.

column.name: VERSION
column.description: The version of the product that ADS support.

column.name: TAB_NAME
column.description: Corresponding tab name of searched menu

column.name: SUBTAB_NAME
column.description: Corresponding sub tab name of searched menu

column.name: SEARCH_COUNT_PER_DAY
column.description: Number of times menu Searched in a day

table.name: ADSDBSyncModules
table.description: AD Modules Exposed for DB Synchronization

column.name: FORCE_PUBLISH
column.description: Boolean value specifying whether to force publish the module during Synchronization

column.name: REPUBLISH
column.description: Boolean value specifying whether to republish the events during Synchronization

table.name: ADSDBSyncModuleColumns
table.description: AD Column Details of the Modules Exposed for DB Synchronization

column.name: DBS_MODULE_COLUMN_ID
column.description: Unique Identifier for the Module Column

column.name: IS_UNIQUE
column.description: Specifies whether this column uniquely identifies the Module

table.name: ADSDBSTableFilter
table.description: Mapping of Modules to Tables for Synchronization

column.name: ALLOWED_OPERATIONS
column.description: Operations to be considered for Synchronization

table.name: ADSDBSColumnFilter
table.description: Mapping of ModuleColumns to Columns for Synchronization

column.name: COLUMN_NAME
column.description: Name of the Column representing the Module Column

table.name: ADSDBSReferenceTables
table.description: Table Details of Columns which refers to another table

table.name: ADSDBSReferenceColumns
table.description: Column Details of Columns which refers to another table

column.name: COLUMN_NAME
column.description: Column Name of the Table which is referred

table.name: ADSDBSyncDistribution
table.description: Details of the Products which subscribes from this product

column.name: LAST_EVENT_ID
column.description: Last Event Id of the Event received by the Subscriber

table.name: ADSDBSyncSubscription
table.description: Details of the Products to which this product subscribes

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: Id of the Product to which this product subscribes

column.name: LAST_EVENT_ID
column.description: Last Event Id of the event received from Distributor

table.name: ADSDBSynchronization
table.description: Configuration of Classes used for DBSynchronization

column.name: LOG_FILE_PATH
column.description: Path of the Replication Log File

column.name: LOG_FILE_NAME
column.description: Name of the Replication Log File

column.name: LOG_FILE_SIZE
column.description: Max Size of the Replication Log File

column.name: USE_IN_RESTAPI
column.description: Enabling this flag will use proxy settings for testconnections between integrated products

column.name: SERVER_URL
column.description: Creator URL for view and download patch

column.name: SERVER_URL
column.description: Creator URL for view and download patch

table.name: ADSRUMPatchDetails
table.description: Contains the downloaded PPM Details for RoboUpdate

column.name: BASE_BUILD
column.description: Base build no from which this PPM should be applied

table.name: ADSRUMProcessAudit
table.description: Contains the RoboUpdate Process Update History

table.name: ADSConnectionSecurity
table.description: Contains the Connection Security Layer Details

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: The Description of the Connection Security Layers

table.name: ADSConnectionSecurityVersions
table.description: Contains the Connection Security Layer Protocol Versions

table.name: ADSCipherSuites
table.description: This table will contain the list of ciphers

column.name: CIPHER_ID
column.description: Unique id generated for each parameter.

table.name: ADSConnectionSecurityVersionVsCipher
table.description: Mapping table for Connection Security Protocol Version and Cipher List

column.name: FOREST_ID
column.description: Forest to which this Organization Belongs

column.name: DAYS_TO_OVERWRITE
column.description: Days to delete the old files

column.name: OVERWRITE
column.description: Delete the old backup files on days/files limit

table.name: ADSBackupConfigAudit
table.description: Audit for Backup Config from parent product

table.name: ADSLicenseExpiration
table.description: Details of the subject, content and the day for the License Expiry Mail to be triggered.

column.name: SUBJECT
column.description: Contains the key for the subject

column.name: CONTENT
column.description: Contains the key for the content

column.name: SUBJECT_AMS
column.description: Contains the key for the AMS subject

column.name: CONTENT_AMS
column.description: Contains the key for the AMS content

column.name: REMINDER_DATE
column.description: Date at which reminder must be enabled

column.name: EXPIRY_DATE
column.description: Date at which the promotion license expires

column.name: DASHBOARD_CONTENT
column.description: RHS Promotion content of the product

column.name: LOGIN_CONTENT
column.description: Login Promotion content of the product

column.name: MAILER_CONTENT
column.description: Mailer Promotion content of the product

column.name: EXPIRY_DATE
column.description: Date at which the promotion license expires

column.name: KEY_NAME
column.description: Name of the key for the Index

column.name: PARAM_NAME
column.description: Names of params for the Key

column.name: COMPONENT_NAME
column.description: Name of the component as per license

column.name: DEFAULT_LIMIT
column.description: Default Limit for the component in Free License

column.name: LIMIT_PERCENT
column.description: Percentage limit for triggering threshold - In decimal

column.name: LIMIT_COUNT
column.description: Count limit for triggering threshold - In int

column.name: IS_SET
column.description: Check if Mail has been initiated

column.name: INTERVAL
column.description: Frequence at which mail must be sent

column.name: ATTEMPTS
column.description: Number of attempts after initial mail

table.name: ADSPSAgentSettings
table.description: This contains Agent id which is mapped to the implementation class

column.name: PS_AGENT_ID
column.description: Unique id for Password Sync agent

column.name: IS_NEW_USER_ALLOWED
column.description: States whether new users created should synced with the Product

table.name: ADSAgentDetails
table.description: Contains the details for all the Agents

column.name: AGENT_ID
column.description: Unique ID to identify each agent

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: IP Address of the machine name on which the agent is running

column.name: MACHINE_NAME
column.description: Machine name on which the agent is running

column.name: DOMAIN_NAME
column.description: Machine name on which the agent is running

table.name: ADSErrorCodes
table.description: Error codes for all errors in ADS

column.name: TAB_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: A Display Name for Each Tab

table.name: ADSRoleVsTab
table.description: Contains the Role Tab Mapping details

table.name: ADSRunQueryConf
table.description: Configuration table for Run Query from UI

column.name: SQL_TASK
column.description: SQL Task - Create, Update, Insert, Delete, Select, Drop, Show, Desc

column.description: Unique Id for each Lync server policy

column.description: A unique id for each lync server.

column.description: The name of the lync server.

table.name: ADSExchOfflineAddress
table.description: Contains the Details of Exchange OfflineAddress

column.description: A unique id for exchange offline address.

column.name: OFFLINE_ADDLIST_NAME
column.description: The name of the AD object

column.description: Distinguished Name of the AD Object

column.description: The distinguished name of the mailbox.

column.name: LOGON_NAME
column.description: The logon name of the mailbox.

column.name: FOLDER
column.description: The ou name of mail box.

column.name: HOME_MDB
column.description: The home of the MailBox Store.

column.name: RECIPIENT_TYPE
column.description: Represents the type of the Mailbox or MailEnabled Object is stored here..

column.name: LEGACY_EXCHANGE_DN
column.description: Legacy exchange DN of the MailBox

column.name: AUDIT_LOGGING_STATUS
column.description: Audit logging status of the MailBox

column.name: MIN_PWD_AGE
column.description: Minimum Time that password is valid

column.name: MAX_PWD_AGE
column.description: Maxmimum Time that password is valid

column.name: PWD_HISTORY_LENGTH
column.description: No of last password will maintain.

table.name: ADSDomainPSObjects
table.description: Contains the different password settings for the domain

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: If it is true DomainDiscovery will continue

column.name: SEARCH_SCOPE
column.description: Scope for the Domains search. ALL - full discovery,FOREST - forest wide search, LOCAL - only look for local domain.

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: If it is true, sub-modules of this module will be updated

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: If it is true DomainDiscovery will continue to get module details

column.name: IS_DEL_UPDATE_ENABLED
column.description: If it is true, details of this sub-module will be updated in DB from AD

column.name: ORDER_ID
column.description: The order which the sub modules will update while adding/updating a domain

column.name: VPN_TYPE
column.description: VPN type to differntiate between native and third party vpn

column.name: PRIORITY
column.description: The order in which the VPN Clients list displays

table.name: ADSAgentConfiguration
table.description: Agent details using which the install/uninstall/upgrade operations made in the product

column.name: AGENT_GUID
column.description: Product GUID assigned for this msi

column.name: AGENT_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name value as if the DisplayName value in the agent's installed registry path

column.name: AGENT_LOCATION
column.description: Agent msi file location with the msi file name

table.name: ADSAgentWorkstationAudit
table.description: Will hold the agent installed/upgraded/uninstalled machine details

column.name: OPERATION
column.description: Performed operation (install/uninstall/upgrade). use constants in AgentTask class.

column.name: COMPLETED_TIME
column.description: Time at when the operation is performed

column.name: MASTER_SERVER_NAME
column.description: Master instance server name or ip

column.name: SLAVE_SERVER_NAME
column.description: SLAVE instance server name or ip

column.name: COMMON_DB_NAME
column.description: Name of the DataBase used for HA setup

table.name: ADSHAFileReplication
table.description: Contains High Availability File Replication configuration details

column.name: IS_REPLICATION_ENABLED
column.description: Is File replication is enabled or not

column.name: REPLICATION_SCHEDULE
column.description: At what interval replication is scheduled in mins

column.name: MIRROR_DIR_LIST
column.description: Which are all the dirs to be mirrored

column.name: COPY_DIR_LIST
column.description: Which are all the dirs to be copied

column.name: COPY_EXCLUDE_DIR_LIST
column.description: Which are all the dirs to be excluded during the copy process

column.name: COPY_EXCLUDE_FILES_LIST
column.description: Which are all the files to be excluded during the copy process

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Parameter which specifies whether feature is enabled

column.name: DB_SYNC_MODULE_NAME
column.description: Name to identify the DB SYNC Module

column.name: IS_DB_SYNC_ENABLED
column.description: Parameter which specifies whether DB Sync is enabled

table.name: ADSTFAProviderModes
table.description: Table which contains the list of Authentication provider modes

column.name: MODE_NAME
column.description: Display name of the Auth Provider mode

column.name: MODE_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of the Auth Provider mode

column.name: PROVIDER_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of the Auth Provider

column.name: ENABLED
column.description: This specifies whether this mode is enabled/disabled

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: This specifies whether this mode is Primary or Not

table.name: ADSTFAModeParams
table.description: Table which contains the parameters for the Authentication providers

column.name: PARAM_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of the Auth Provider mode

column.name: NOTIFICATION_ID
column.description: Identifier of Notification to which the user is mapped

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: This flag specifies whether the notification module is enabled

column.name: NOTIFICATION_ID
column.description: Identifier of Notification to which the login is mapped

column.name: ROLE_ID
column.description: Identifier of Role which is mapped to account

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: This flag specifies whether the notification module is enabled

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Whether the configuration is enabled or not

table.name: ADSSmartCardVsDomain
table.description: Contains the Smart Card Domain Mapping Details

column.name: SMARTCARD_ID
column.description: Unique Id for representing a row in AD Domain Link Table

table.name: ADSLogForwardConfig
table.description: table to store the siem forwarder config details

table.name: ADSSMSAPISettings
table.description: Contains the SMS Provider API Configuration

column.name: ACCESS_PARAM
column.description: Access parameter for the API. MAIL_ID/HTTP_URL

column.name: EMAIL_ID
column.description: Notify admin when balance reaches its threshold.

column.name: MOBILE_NO
column.description: Notify admin when balance reaches its threshold.

column.name: DOMAIN_NAME
column.description: Domain name to which the user is associated

table.name: ADSTFATrust
table.description: Table which contains the Trusted Browsers details

column.description: Domain name to which the user is associated

column.name: TIME
column.description: Time at which this entry is made.

column.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
column.description: A unique id for each integrated product

column.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
column.description: A unique id for each integrated product

table.name: ADSIPRestriction
table.description: Allow or restrict access to application based on IP address and IP range

table.name: ADSSecondaryLicComponents
table.description: Contains secondary license components that could be applied

column.name: PRIORITY_ID
column.description: the order in which the license must be applied

table.name: ADSCaptchaConfig
table.description: Contains data related to captcha rendering config

column.name: IMAGE_WIDTH
column.description: Width of the captcha image in pixels

column.name: IMAGE_HEIGHT
column.description: Height of the captcha image in pixels

column.name: NOISE_LEVEL
column.description: Level of noise to be added in captcha

column.name: IS_BG_APPLIED
column.description: To apply background to the captcha image

column.name: CAPTCHA_LENGTH
column.description: Number of characters the captcha should have

column.name: TIME_TO_RESET
column.description: Time in minutes after which captcha must not be displayed

table.name: ADSUsersBadLoginStatus
table.description: Table which contains the users bad login status

column.name: LAST_BAD_LOGIN_TIME
column.description: Time when the last status was updated

column.name: FIRST_BAD_LOGIN_TIME
column.description: Time when the first bad login was made

column.name: BLOCKING_STATUS
column.description: Time when the last status was updated

column.name: FONT_COLOR
column.description: Font colors of the captcha - Add hex values.

table.name: ADSCaptchaFonts
table.description: Contains font styles to be rendered for captcha

column.name: FONT_FACE
column.description: Font face of captcha--Bold : "fontName Bold", ITALIC"fontName Italic", Bold Italic "fontName Bold Italic"

table.name: ADSBlockUserConfig
table.description: Contains params for block user configuration

column.name: MAX_ATTEMPTS
column.description: Number of badlogin attempts before user is blocked

column.name: RESET_TIME
column.description: Time until bad login is counted

table.name: ADSReverseProxyConfig
table.description: Contains params for block user configuration

table.name: ADSReverseProxyConfigVsProduct
table.description: Contains params for block user configuration

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: CONTEXT
column.description: Context for the product incase of Context Based Reverse Proxy

table.name: ADSKeystoreEntry
table.description: Contains key aliases and corresponding keypass

column.name: FREE_SPACE_LIMIT
column.description: Free Space limit for the insallation drive in Bytes

column.name: IS_EMAIL_ALERT_ENABLED
column.description: Alert by email enabled Or disabled

column.name: EMAIL_IDS
column.description: multiple email id seperated by comma for alert messages

column.name: MAIL_SUBJECT
column.description: message settings for alert email-subject of the email

column.name: MAIL_CONTENT
column.description: message settings for alert email-content of the email

column.name: MAIL_PRIORITY
column.description: message settings for alert email-priority of the email

table.name: ADSDiskSpaceDailyUsage
table.description: Disk Space Monitor- Maintains history of disk space reports

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique Id for each monitor instance

column.name: ROOT_FOLDER_SIZE
column.description: size of Installation Directory in Bytes

table.name: ADSSSLToolTracking
table.description: Contains METRack Information for SSL Tool

table.name: ADSChangeDBAudit
table.description: Contains METRack Information for Database Configuration

table.name: ADSFeedbackLicenseComponents
table.description: Contains data about license component data to be sent

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: ID of the product to which the param belongs

column.name: PARAM_NAME
column.description: Name of the param from forms

column.name: PARAM_VALUE
column.description: This is the text that will be used to represent the param in creator

column.name: FORM_ORDER
column.description: Order in which the forms should appear

column.name: SUCCESS_STATUS
column.description: Status to be returned after successful form submit - Configure i18n keys

column.name: MAIL_SUBJECT
column.description: Subject of the mail - Configure text in English if english alone is needed

column.name: DEMO_MAIL_SUBJECT
column.description: Subject of the mail from demo server- Configure text in English if english alone is needed

table.name: ADSFeedbackFields
table.description: Contains field to be displayed in the feedback forms

column.name: FIELD_NAME
column.description: Name of the field - mapped to the element name

column.name: FIELD_PLACEHOLDER
column.description: Placeholder value of the field - mapped to the element - considered only for custom fields

column.name: FIELD_TYPE
column.description: Type of the field - text or textarea or radio - considered only for custom fields

column.name: IS_CUSTOM_FIELD
column.description: Is the field a custom field

table.name: ADSFeedbackFormsvsFields
table.description: Contains mapping between forms and fields

column.name: FORM_ID
column.description: Form ID which are to be displayed

column.name: FIELD_ID
column.description: Field ID which must be displayed in the form

column.name: IS_MANDATORY
column.description: Is the field in the particular form mandatory

column.name: REMINDER_TIME
column.description: Time at which the alert must be shown again

column.name: END_TIME
column.description: Time at which the alert should no longer be shown

column.name: DURATION
column.description: Days until the registered alert must be shown

column.name: IS_TRIAL_ALERT
column.description: Whether to show the alert on trial or after registration

column.name: SHOW_DD
column.description: Whether to show in Form Options

column.name: PRIORITY
column.description: Order in which the registered alerts must be displayed

column.name: REMINDER_DURATION
column.description: Days after which the alert has to be shown after rejection

column.name: SUPPORTED_BUILD_NO
column.description: Product version that supports the feature

column.name: SERVER_VALUE
column.description: Server Value of the datetime format

table.name: ADSLogForwardConfigAudit
table.description: Audit for LogforwardConfig from parent product

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: OWNER_NAME
column.description: Zoho Creator's account owner name of the application as specified in the Creator.

column.name: AUTH_TOKEN
column.description: Application Owner/developer's auth token which is needed to make rest api calls to the application.

column.name: APP_LINK_NAME
column.description: The application's app link name as specified in the application settings in creator.

table.name: ADSPromotionAudit
table.description: Contains the Promotion Audit View History

column.name: DOMAIN_NAME
column.description: Domain name to which the user is associated

column.name: GENERATED_TIME
column.description: Time at which verification code generated.

column.name: CODE_ID
column.description: A unique id for each code

column.name: FEATURE_NAME
column.description: Same FEATURE NAME should be mentioned as in ADSFeatures table

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Enabled or disabled state of the product feature

column.name: PRODUCT_NAME
column.description: Custom Product's Full Name e.g AD Free Tools

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Custom Product's Display Name e.g Active Directory Free Tools

column.name: PRIORITY_ID
column.description: Priority in which order it should be showed

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Enabled or disabled state of the custom product

column.name: PROMOTION_ID
column.description: A unique id for each promotion

column.name: PROMOTION_ID
column.description: A unique id for each promotion

column.name: LINK_ID
column.description: A unique id for each links

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: INSTALLATION_TAG_NAME
column.description: Tag Name of the Product same as TAG_NAME in ADSProducts Table

column.name: IS_VISIBLE
column.description: 0- Product is invisible in Integration Settings 1-Product is visible in Integration Settings

column.name: IS_ACTIVATED
column.description: 0- Dont start the product 1- Start the product

column.name: SHOW_SPLASHSCREEN
column.description: 0- Product is invisible on show splash screen 1-Product is visible on show splash screen

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: AD Mail Notification Settings Unique Id

table.name: ADSAuthScopeVsAPI
table.description: Contains the authtoken scope and api mapping details

table.name: ADSAuthScopeVsRole
table.description: Contains the authtoken scope and user role mapping details

table.name: ADSAuthScopeVsProduct
table.description: Contains the authtoken scope and product id mapping details

column.name: AUTH_TOKEN_STATE
column.description: Represents whether the token is active or expired or revoked (0-ACTIVE, 1-EXPIRED, 2-REVOKED, 3-REVOKED_AND_EXPIRED)

column.name: ACCOUNT_ID
column.description: Unique Id for each user account

column.name: TOKEN_TYPE
column.description: Represents whether the token is authtoken, access token or refresh token (0-AUTH_TOKEN, 1-REFRESH_TOKEN, 2-ACCESS_TOKEN)

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: Product ID to which the token belongs

column.name: IS_FETCHED
column.description: Denotes whether the token is generated in same product or fetched from other product

table.name: ADSAuthTokenVsScope
table.description: Contains the authtokens and scope mapping details

table.name: ADSAuthTokenParams
table.description: Contains parameter for configuring the authtokens

column.name: MIN_THRESHOLD_DURATION
column.description: Rest API requests are made only when token expiration time has more than the minimum threshold duration, given in seconds, to expire.

column.name: REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRY_DURATION
column.description: The expiration duration for refresh token in seconds. Must be greater than access token expiry duration.

column.name: ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRY_DURATION
column.description: The expiration duration for access token in seconds.

table.name: ADSWebSocketConfig
table.description: Contains ads web socket configuration details

table.name: ADSBrowserNotificationCenter
table.description: Contains Browser Notification Center Entry Details

column.name: NOTIFICATION_NAME
column.description: The name of the Browser notification module

column.name: IMPL_CLASS
column.description: Contains Handler class name of the Browser notification module

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: This flag specifies whether the Browser notification module is enabled

table.name: ADSBrowserNotificationTypes
table.description: Contains ads Browser Notification Type Details

column.name: IS_SILENT
column.description: 0- Notify with sound 1- Notify with silent

column.name: BUFFER_TIME
column.description: Notification Buffer Time value is in Milliseconds

column.name: IS_REPEATABLE
column.description: 0- Notification Not Sent Again After Buffer Time gets Completed 1- Notification Sent Again After Buffer Time gets Completed

column.name: NOTIFICATION_START_TIME
column.description: Notification Start Time value is in Milliseconds, Notification Starts showing to the user after this time starts. Set null value will show Notification all the time.

column.name: NOTIFICATION_END_TIME
column.description: Notification End Time value is in Milliseconds, Notification End showing to the user after this time starts. Set null value will show Notification all the time.

column.name: USER_ROLE
column.description: Shows Notification to the specific user role

column.name: ONCLICK_URL
column.description: Browser Notification On Click redirect URL

column.name: EXPIRY_DATE
column.description: Expiry Date value is in Milliseconds, Notification will not show to the User once it get expired. Set -1 value for non expiry notification

column.name: EXTRA_PARAMS
column.description: Extra Params value holds the params values in JSONObject for Browser notification

table.name: ADSBrowserNotificationAudit
table.description: Contains ads Browser Notification Audit details

column.name: STATUS
column.description: Browser Notification Status Value, 0 - Waiting to Send 1 - Notification Sent 2 - Notification Shown 3 - Notification Clicked 4 - Notification Closed 5 - Notification Error

column.name: IS_SHOWN
column.description: 0- Not Shown to User 1- Is Shown to User

column.name: IS_CLICKED
column.description: 0- Not Clicked by User 1- Is Clicked by User

column.name: AVAILABLE_TIME
column.description: Notification Available Time is in Milliseconds, It holds the next Available time to Send the Notification.

column.name: USER_ROLE
column.description: Shows Notification to the specific user role

column.name: ONCLICK_URL
column.description: Creator Notification On Click redirect URL

column.name: EXPIRY_DATE
column.description: Expiry Date value is in Milliseconds, Notification will not show to the User once it get expired. Set -1 value for non expiry notification

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: A unique id for each product

column.name: CHILD_COMPONENT_ID
column.description: component id which is present in the child product

column.name: IS_PARENT_COMPONENT
column.description: true - if the product is parent product (admin server), false - child product

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Product type: 1 - Standalone, 2 - Distributed (Admin Server), 3 - Distributed (Managed Server)
